data.title: Sinclair Names Mark Turner General Manager in Charleston/Huntington, West Virginia
data.meta_description: /PRNewswire/ -- Sinclair Broadcast Group, Inc. (Nasdaq: SBGI) announced that Mark Turner has been named General Manager for WCHS-TV (ABC) in the...
data.text:
CHARLESTON, W.Va., May 9, 2016 /PRNewswire/ -- Sinclair Broadcast Group, Inc. (Nasdaq: SBGI) announced that Mark Turner has been named General Manager for WCHS-TV (ABC) in the Charleston/Huntington, West Virginia market. Mr. Turner will also be responsible for oversight of WVAH-TV (FOX), which is programmed by Sinclair under a time brokerage agreement. The announcement was made by Steve Marks, Co-Chief Operating Officer of Sinclair's television group.

In making the announcement, Mr. Marks said, "We welcome Mark, who has over 25 years of sales and management experience in the broadcast industry, to Charleston, West Virginia. As a previous General Manager in a top 25 market, Mark has extensive experience in leading and motivating teams to achieve meaningful results including increased revenues and market share."

"I am excited to join the team at WCHS and WVAH and continue building on the legacy of service to their viewers, communities and advertisers," commented Mr. Turner. "I am also very excited about joining a company as committed to their local communities and as forward thinking as Sinclair."

Mr. Turner most recently worked as a consultant for the Oxford Center in Atlanta, Georgia. From 2012 to 2015, he served as the Director of Sales for WGCL-TV (CBS) and Peach TV (IND) in Atlanta, Georgia. From 2002 to 2012, he was the Senior Vice President and Chief Operating Officer at Millennium Sales and Marketing in New York, New York. Prior to that, Mr. Turner was the Vice President and General Manager for WCCB-TV (previously the FOX affiliate) in Charlotte, North Carolina. Mr. Turner has held other positions including VP / Director of Sales for 15 Katz TV Group offices, Vice President / General Manager at Devaney and Associates Ad Agency, and account executive at various North Carolina television stations. Mr. Turner received a Bachelor's Degree in Political Science from the University of North Carolina-Chapel Hill.

Sinclair is one of the largest and most diversified television broadcasting companies in the country. Including pending transactions, the Company owns, operates and/or provides services to 172 television stations in 81 markets, broadcasting 478 channels and having affiliations with all the major networks. Sinclair is the leading local news provider in the country, as well as a producer of live sports content. Sinclair's content is delivered via multiple-platforms, including over-the-air, multi-channel video program distributors, and digital platforms. The Company regularly uses its website as a key source of Company information which can be accessed at www.sbgi.net.
